27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) never criticized any food. if he liked it, he would eat it, and if not, he would leave it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَرْكِ الْعَيْبِ لِلنِّعْمَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Being Humble
